already in 2's complement
0x0013
0b0000000000010011 -> 19

0xffff 
0b1111111111111111 -> -1

~0b1111111111111111 + 1
 0b0000000000000000 + 1
 0b0000000000000001


0x8000
0b100000000000000 -> -32768

~0b100000000000000 + 1
 0b011111111111111 + 1
 0b100000000000000 -> -2^15


8 bit binary
-5
~0b00000101 + 1
 0b11111010 + 1
 0b11111011 -> -5

~0b11111011 + 1
 0b00000100 + 1
 0b00000101

sign bit representation
msb is sign, last 7 bits are number
0 0000101 -> 5
1 0000101 -> -5

-100 
~0b01100100 + 1
 0b10011011 + 1
 0b10011100 -> -100

~0b10011100 + 1
 0b01100011 + 1
 0b01100100


0 01111111 10000000000000000000000 
-1^sign * (1 + frac) * 2^(exp - 127)
1 * (1.5) * 2^(127 - 127)
1.5 * 2^0
1.5

1 10010100 10000000000000000000000 
-1^sign * (1 + frac) * 2^(exp - 127)
-1 * (1.5) * 2^(148 - 127)
-1.5 * 2^21 = -3145728
